extendedInfo.description: Study Quran (Spanish: Muhammad Asad - Abdurrasak PÃ©rez) is a great Al-Quran App for Android and easy way for you to learn Quran. You can read the Quranic verse in Spanish: Muhammad Asad - Abdurrasak PÃ©rez translation.Now you can:-Add CheckPoint & Go to CheckPoint from Menu Button-Add, Edit Bookmark Name, List of Bookmarks-Compare a verse with different Translations with single click of the verse (Internet required)-Search for a word with Saved Searches -Copy & Paste Chapter Name & Verse Text-Share this App to everyone-Arabic Verses-Arabic Chapters-Random Verses-Synchronize Bookmarks & Searches (Online Backup)

reviews.title: Does not even open.
reviews.comment: When i try to open this app It closes before it even opens.
reviews.author: A Google User
